question: i've been diagnosed with type 2 diabetes. but in the past had a liver biopsy that showed triaditis of the bile ducts. plus outbreaks of hepititis a and a history of hi lipids and lipidemia. also high enzymes quite often. also hypertension for many years now. my question is are these all things that could lead up to the diabetes type 2.
title: diabetes type2 / triaditis
